main event: One (1) white object, changing from red to white to red, the size of a star at a distance, appeared 50 miles east of Clearfield, Pa. and disappeared into the haze for two hours.
interesting points: Light appeared to flicker up and down but remained in the same spot for the time of sighting.
Observers at airport saw two (2) aircraft passed near object, aircraft not picked up by radar.
Contradictory statements in the witness' report makes analysis and evaluation impossible.
sighted object: one white object, changing from red to white to red
